TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
yup, but, ..., for some reason this whole thread is brought to your attention so now you feel happy ; ) by happy i mean happy

i wish i wish or could wish or should wish ; ) does it change anithing ?

Granted, but everyone's head explodes due to the slight paradox involved in that wish. In depression, you kill yourself.

I wish for SPAddict to gift me a SSTO design.

He does, but he forgot about your birthday until the last minute and just gave you the first plane off of his trash pile. It goes missing somewhere over the Pacific, and your friends and family never find out your fate for sure.

Undyne was an interesting fight. I wish she had a more difficult battle.

Who? Granted, you die before the wish happens.

I wish Sanic would stop hugging Dres so I can land my spaceplanes on it.

Granted, but he destroys it so that nobody else can enjoy it either

I wish it were Friday, not Monday

Granted, but now you'll have to work/go to school in the weekends too!

I wish I had my 2 monitor setup back (in working condition!).

Granted, but one monitor displays an endless loop of the star wars holiday special. Even when off or unplugged. It cannot be muted.

I wish I could figure out how to make a boat.

Granted: you find out, but every boat you ever build is sunken immeadititly after it launches.

I wish for a decent, non poisonous salt pretzel with some decent, non poisonous salty cheese sauce.

Granted, you die of shock after tasting it's inhuman disgust.

I wish for my WishCeption to hunt down Sanic and bark at him.

Granted, but as this geenie does not know what a WishCeption is exactly, Sanic is attacked by a cute barking puppy.

I wish for 1.1 making a surprsingly bugfree release!

Granted, it comes out when you are killed by a doge.

I wish for a DankMeme

Granted, but the contextual definition of "dank" is mixed up, and you receive a soggy, rotting troll face instead.

I wish the Moon landings were still going on.

Granted, but everybody else is already building a decent colony on Mars. (The moon is so last season, you are way out of touch with the trends)

I wish KSP has multiplayer.

Granted, it turns the community into trolls, griefers, and absolute nubs who get insulted 24/7

I wish for a DankMeme to destroy Sanic with.

Granted. You get a cute cat meme incapable of doing anything but being cute.

I wish for a working SSTO.

AWWW ITS SO CUTE

Granted, but a new KSP patch breaks it.

I wish I could, uh, come up with a question (wait, didn't I already say that?)

I wish I could come up with a question that I didn't already ask!

Granted. The question scarres everyone for life.

I wish for a dankmeme to destroy Sanic with.

The urban dictionary lists eight meanings of "dank meme." Lack of information has resulted in a explosive shutdown of your computer.

I wish I had the attention span to finish a challenge.

Granted, you complete the "Best Breather in Human Space Program"

I wish for an Anti-Sanic Meme

Granted. The Anti-lawyer mechanism stops working.

I wish for a permanent, real, licensed, non-injured, immortal, reusable, living, human, cheap lawyer, who is good at law, speaks the same language as me, likes me (and will continue to), will win cases in civil law when I ask him to, gets me money back, makes me look good, and will remain my lawyer in perpetuity.

Granted. The Anti-lawyer mechanism stops working.

I wish for a permanent, real, licensed, non-injured, immortal, reusable, living, human, cheap lawyer, who is good at law, speaks the same language as me, likes me (and will continue to), will win cases in civil law when I ask him to, gets me money back, makes me look good, and will remain my lawyer in perpetuity.

Granted, he's a licensed lawyer from alaska (Like him)

I wish it'd be easier for me to build SSTOs that are still usable after an update.

Granted. Your rockets don't work.

I wish for a permanent, real, licensed in my state, non-injured, immortal, reusable, living, human, cheap lawyer, who is good at law, speaks the same language as me, likes me (and will continue to), will win cases in civil law when I ask him to, gets me money back, makes me look good, and will remain my lawyer in perpetuity.

Granted. He doesn't exist.

I wish for no bad (as in not-good) wishes.

Granted. You never said when.

I wish for Dres to be loved by all.

Granted. Dres gets destroyed by the sheer number of landers.

I wish that kerbals are in real life.
